sourcesContent:
<style src="./Vue3View.css"></style>
<template src="./Vue3View.html"></template>
<script>
    import ViewtitleComponent from '@/components/ViewtitleComponent/ViewtitleComponent.vue'

    export default {
        name: "Vue3View",
        inject: ["GDATA"],
        data() {
            return {
                areaName: "Vue 3",
                areaKey: "vue3",
                logo_link: "https://v3.ru.vuejs.org/logo.png",
                links_list: [
                    {link: "https://v3.ru.vuejs.org/ru/", title: "Оффициальный сайт"},
                ]
            }
        },
        components: {
            ViewtitleComponent,
        },
        provide() {
            return {
                areaName: this.areaName,
                logoLink: this.logo_link,
                linksList: this.links_list,
            }
        },
        computed: {
            AGDATA: function () {
                return this.GDATA[this.areaKey];
            }
        }
    }
</script>
